FGL.JO.summary: Finbond Group Limited operates as a financial services institution in South Africa and North America. It operates through Investment Products, Lending, Property Investment, and Transactional Banking segments. The company offers short-term unsecured and secured lending services, as well as insurance, credit, and savings and investment products. It also provides Internet banking services. Finbond Group Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Pretoria, the Republic of South Africa.
